title: Cant log in to chat.
body: I cant log in to chat unless i relog. Its only like that on my laptop, on my pc everything works fine. How to fix it?

replies.body:
Most of the time chat issues are caused by local network configurations that clash with League. The steps outlined in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should help you resolve this issue.

Let me know if this helped.
